channel.title: Guthans

item.title: Guthans
item.dc:creator: @T-R-A-V-I-S T-R-A-V-I-S
item.description:
@T-R-A-V-I-S wrote:

i have recently added working guthans to my server and i needed to know how do i make the healing not hit as often? like on real rs it goes off every once and awhile. heres the code for it

public void guthan() { if(misc.random(15) == 1) { stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX); sendMessage("You Drain Your Oponents Health"); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);[

Im thinking it has to do with this:

if(misc.random(15) == 1)

Read full topic
